Footer.wifiClaims: WiFi claim based on March 2016 study by Allion Test Labs, Inc. of router performance.
Footer.prepaid: *Prepaid card mailed to OceanBleu account holder within 18 weeks of activation of all required services and expires in 90 days. Prepaid cards issued by Citibank, N.A., pursuant to a license from U.S.A. Inc. and managed by Citi Prepaid Services. Cards will not have cash access and can be used everywhere Prepaid cards are accepted. Call for restrictions and complete details.

OceanBleuTvPage.hundreds: Hundreds of channels, thousands of hit movies and the most free ON Demand
OceanBleuTvPage.enjoy: Enjoy live TV, On Demand, sports, and your favorite streaming apps all in one place!
OceanBleuTvPage.enjoyText: With OceanBleu TV you can enjoy shows and movies instantly on any screen, catch up on the latest episodes of TV’s hottest shows and even watch entire past seasons with OceanBleu On Demand. Plus you can watch your favorite networks live anytime, anywhere.
OceanBleuTvPage.changeWay: Change the way you experience entertainment with OceanBleu’s advanced TV features.
OceanBleuTvPage.feature-3: X1 Box + DVR—record up to 6 shows at once and get 500 GB of storage
OceanBleuTvPage.feature-4: X1 Voice Remote—to manage your OceanBleu WiFi, Voice and Home Security from your TV
OceanBleuTvPage.feature-5: OceanBleu Stream app, to access your entertainment on the go

HelpPage.serviceDesc: Service Help for Current OceanBleu Customers
HelpPage.detail: If you are currently a residential OceanBleu customer, please select the appropriate support desk’s contact details from the list below:

BundlesPage.choose: Choose from a range of fast, reliable Internet speeds and all the live TV, sports, and entertainment you love
BundlesPage.liveTv: Live TV, the best On Demand experience, fast speeds, and more
BundlesPage.findBestPlan: Find the best plan for you
BundlesPage.saveBig:
Save big on fast, reliable Internet speeds and all the
live TV, sports and entertainment you love with OceanBleu!
BundlesPage.bundlesText: Save on reliably fast Internet and X1 TV, the ultimate entertainment experience. OceanBleu offers the best in-home WiFi and the most free TV shows and movies on the go. Plus, when you switch to OceanBleu you’ll also enjoy many more amazing features, like the X1 DVR, the X1 Voice Remote, online security, and millions of WiFi hotspots nationwide.
BundlesPage.tool-1: xFi Gateway—an easy-to-use modem and router in one
BundlesPage.tool-2: xFi app—control your WiFi from anywhere
BundlesPage.tool-3: Millions of OceanBleu WiFi hotspots nationwide
BundlesPage.tv-3: X1 Box + DVR—record up to 6 shows at once and get 500 GB of storage
BundlesPage.tv-4: X1 Voice Remote—to manage your OceanBleu WiFi, Voice and Home Security from your TV
BundlesPage.tv-5: OceanBleu Stream app, to access your entertainment on the go
BundlesPage.switch: Switch to OceanBleu, and get the most advanced digital home features.
BundlesPage.voice-2: Reliable service with the best call clarity
BundlesPage.voice-3: Advanced calling features, including Caller ID and Readable Voicemail
BundlesPage.voice-5: OceanBleu Connect app, to manage your phone on the go
BundlesPage.security-3: Fast response time from an award-winning monitoring station
BundlesPage.security-4: Arm, disarm and control your security system remotely
BundlesPage.security-5: Door and window sensors, motion sensors, touchscreen controller, and wireless keypad included
BundlesPage.workBetterTogether: Our services work even better together
